courses.who_for: Texas drivers with minor traffic tickets (dismissal once per 12 months) or seeking insurance discount.
requirements: Court permission required for ticket dismissal

submission.certificate: Two copies: Court copy (submit to court), Insurance copy (submit to insurer)
submission.reporting: Providers issue embossed certificates; not electronic
submission.deadlines: Court deadline ~90 days; insurance discount valid 3 years

court_vs_insurance.court: Court dismisses ticket upon timely certificate submission.

courses.who_for: Texas first-time applicants age 18–24 (mandatory), optional for 25+.
requirements: Includes DPS written test if taken online

submission.certificate: Form ADE-1317 (online) or DE-964 (classroom) must be presented at DPS
submission.reporting: Submit certificate to DPS when taking road test
submission.deadlines: Certificate valid until used; Impact Texas Adult Driver video required within 90 days

court_vs_insurance.insurance: May qualify for insurance discounts depending on insurer.
